datasets.name: LibriSpeech
datasets.description: A large corpus of read English speech, suitable for training and evaluating automatic speech recognition systems.

datasets.name: Common Voice
datasets.description: A multilingual dataset of voices collected from volunteers, aimed at improving speech recognition systems.

datasets.name: UrbanSound8K
datasets.description: A dataset containing 8,732 labeled sound excerpts from urban environments, useful for sound classification tasks.

datasets.name: VoxCeleb
datasets.description: A large-scale speaker identification dataset containing speech from thousands of celebrities.

datasets.name: AudioSet
datasets.description: A large-scale dataset of audio events, containing over 2 million human-labeled 10-second sound clips.
